title: Complete addIceCandidate request from client to server
description:
Encapsulates a client-to-device message sent via the signaling server.
This flavour of the signaling message defines the format that the client must use when sending.

type.description: Specifies this message as a signaling message

targetId.description: The target id to which the client wants to send the client-to-device message

orgId.description: The id of the organization that the device belongs to.

accessToken.description: Token from `auth.axis.com` for the logged in user.

P2P.title: addIceCandidate
P2P.description: Requests the receiver of the message to add a remote ICE candidate originating from the requestor.

apiVersion.description: The API version used in the request.

type.description: Specifies that this message is a request

sessionId.description: An identifier chosen by the client that should be used for all messages belonging to this session.

context.description: An optional identifier chosen by the requestor that can be used to correlate the response with the request.

params.description: Parameters for the request. The parameters match the contents of the [`RTCIceCandidate` interface](https://w3c.github.io/webrtc-pc/#dom-rtcicecandidate)

candidate.description: An SDP ICE candidate formatted according to [RFC8839, section 5.1](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc8839#section-5.1)

sdpMLineIndex.description: The `RTCIceCandidate` attribute `sdpMLineIndex` as described in the [WebRTC W3C specification](https://w3c.github.io/webrtc-pc#dom-rtcicecandidate)

sdpMid.description: The `RTCIceCandidate` attribute `sdpMid` as described in the [WebRTC W3C specification](https://w3c.github.io/webrtc-pc#dom-rtcicecandidate)
